dosageInstruction.text: 1 g, Intravenous, Every 8 hours, First dose on Sun 7/21/24 at 1345, Pre-op

As needed, Starting on Sun 7/21/24 at 1406, Intra-op

100 mL/hr, Intravenous, Continuous, Starting on Sun 7/21/24 at 1345
